name: Bobble_Hat
description: The Bobble Hat is a large knit hat. Its color changes to match that of the wearer's ink, but it has two horizontal stripes and a fluffy bobble on the end that are always white. On its left side is a white patch with the Splash Mob logo, and on its right are two pins - one small and black with a white squid, and one large and orange with a purple seashell.

name: Cap'n_Cap
description: The Cap'n Cap is a peaked cap with a crown matching the player's ink color and a black brim. Along the brim is a thick black string connected by two gold buttons with anchors on them. A black Splash Mob logo is sewn onto the back.

name: Classic_Bowler
description: The Classic Bowler is a stark black bowler hat with an old-fashioned look. The trim, in the same colour as the garment itself, holds a golden pin with a thin chain and an ornament resembling a jellyfish.

name: Half-Rim_Glasses
description: The Half-Rim Glasses are a pair of eyeglasses with thick frames. Its color changes to a darker shade of the wearer's ink. On the inside of the temples, the Splash Mob logo can be seen in white text.

name: House-Tag_Denim_Cap
description: The House-Tag Denim Cap is a denim cap lined with yellow thread along the outside of the visor and along the edges of the cap. It changes color with the player's ink. A brown label and a  Splash Mob logo are also included on the left side of the cap.

name: Jean_Dream_Bucket
description: The Jean Dream Bucket is a denim bucket hat. Made of a washed fabric and covered in stitches, it changes colour to a lighter version of the wearer's ink. The hat's rear is covered in a faded white stencil print. A dark brown Splash Mob label is visible on the dented brim.

name: Retro_Specs
description: The Retro Specs are a pair of black, square-shaped glasses with thick rims. On the frames are small sections that change color to match the wearer's ink. While they appear to not have lenses, as they do not seem to reflect light in an obvious manner, they do have them.

name: Striped_Beanie
description: The Striped Beanie is a simple knit hat that changes color based on that of the wearer's Ink, with four horizontal white stripes.
